description: Harada Chie is a classmate of Mai Tokiha; whom she sits directly behind, and Yuuichi Tate. She offers her friendship on Mai`s first day, introducing herself by poking Mai`s sides playfully. She uses her cell phone`s camera frequently to give interviews and is always searching for new gossip around the school, which develops into a running gag about her character. She and Aoi Senou appear in an omake as super deformed versions of themselves to give a rundown of their class, classifying Mai as being in the "Biggest Breast Ranking".
name: Harada Chie
